revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: col. i (Year) 21 Thoyth, poll-tax of Theognis; list of payers of the impost. Heracles, son of Panteuchos .. Apollonios Nikias, son of Apollonios, son of Nicaios Petosiris Kapai... Dionysios Kronides Maron Patynis Kastor Meni.. E... Petosiris col. ii Harphaesis, son of Arachthos Didymos Pet... ... �kal Ergeus, son of Psenesis Kollouthes Pausis, merchant Naaraus, son Papontos, son of Sentheus Diodoros, barber Onnophris, son of Orsenouphis Pa..osthu.thes, brother Patynis, son of Moschion Ophelion, smith Peteeus, muleteer Paynis, son of Harphaesis Cephalon, flautist Harmiysis, son of Onnophris Kalatutis, son of B... Doras, son of A�sis

listBibl.bibl: P.Tebt., I.103; Chrest. Wilck., no. 288; Vandoni, Feste, no. 65 (line 36 only) See BL v. 9, p. 354.
